title: BeyoncĂŠ Makes Houston Teenage Cancer Patient’s Dream Come True with FaceTime Call

Banks â€” who attends Alief Hastings High School in Houston, Texas â€” has spent most of her senior year at MD Anderson Cancer Center fightingÂ a rare stage four cancer, according to KIAH , a local news station. And as the ultimate graduation present, Banksâ€™Â friends and classmates created the hashtag #EBOBMEETSBEYONCE on social media so that she could meet with BeyoncĂŠ Â in an effort to help make one of herÂ biggest dreams come true.
